alert.note: Alert for Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Person County through 715 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leasburg, or 9 miles east of Yanceyville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Concord, Bethel Hill, Hyco Lake, Mayo Reservoir and Hyco Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
